title: Ep 3 | Biden’s Battle and the Reliability of the Scriptures
description:
Joe Biden’s campaign slogan sounds familiar, doesn’t it? Phil, Al, and Jase discuss Joe’s battle for the soul of our nation, the reliability of the scriptures, and their thoughts on writing a book.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
